snippet: The sheriff of Tuolumne County, east of San Francisco, said the boys had “very detailed” plans to shoot specific people, including teachers.
abstract: Plans by four Tuoloumne County, Calif, high school students to commit campus shooting are thwarted by vigilant fellow students and teachers; suspects are arrested just before plot, which law enforcement officials say was very detailed, is carried out.
lead_paragraph: The sheriff of Tuolumne County, east of San Francisco, said the boys had “very detailed” plans to shoot specific people, including teachers.

headline.main: 4 Students Arrested in Northern California, Suspected of Plotting Killings in High School
headline.print_headline: 4 California Students Arrested, Suspected of Plotting Killings in High School
